reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 430/02: CERTIFICATE OF PASSING OF RESOLUTION - SECTION 159.1 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: CERTIFICATE OF PASSING OF RESOLUTION — SECTION 159.1 OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 430/02: CERTIFICATE OF PASSING OF RESOLUTION - SECTION 159.1 OF THE ACT

content.content: 1. The certificate referred to in subsection 159.1 (4) of the Act shall be in the form approved by the Minister titled “Certificate of Passing of Resolution Under Section 159.1 of the Electricity Act, 1998”, dated December 20, 2002 and available at the Ministry of Energy, 4th floor, Hearst Block, 900 Bay Street, Toronto, Ontario or at www.energy.gov.on.ca/english/pdf/resolution_certificate.pdf. O. Reg. 430/02, s. 1. Français
content.raw_html:
1. The certificate referred to in subsection 159.1 (4) of the Act shall be in the form approved by the Minister titled “Certificate of Passing of Resolution Under Section 159.1 of the Electricity Act, 1998”, dated December 20, 2002 and available at the Ministry of Energy, 4th floor, Hearst Block, 900 Bay Street, Toronto, Ontario or at www.energy.gov.on.ca/english/pdf/resolution_certificate.pdf. O. Reg. 430/02, s. 1.

Français
